title: Arsenal transfer news: Alexis Sanchez should sign new Emirates deal, says Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 10:21 pm Alexis Sanchez is a target for several European clubs (Picture: Getty) 
Steven Gerrard insists he would sign a new deal at Arsenal if he was Alexis Sanchez . 
Sanchez, who has been one of the Gunners’ stand-out players since signing from Barcelona in 2014, is currently involved in a contract stand-off at the Emirates. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Talks over a new contract are believed to be ongoing, but the Chilean is yet to agree to an extension, sparking fears he could leave the club in the summer. 
Liverpool legend Gerrard says Arsenal must ensure he remains at the Emirates as he can be the ‘difference’ in big games. 
When asked how he would act if he was Sanchez, Gerrard told BT Sport : ‘I would sign a contract. 
‘He’s in good form, he seems happy. He seems like he’s playing well. 
‘If you’re Arsenal, you give him what he wants – he’s a world-class footballer. Arsenal fixtures

‘He’s that type of player that can be the difference in the big games and those players are very hard to sign.’ 
Sanchez, 28, scored a brace on Saturday as Arsenal beat relegation-battlers Hull City 2-0 at the Emirates.
